page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The nature of the area covered by our 3x4 kilometre block is very diverse.The river{Irwell,}a tributary of the Mersey,flows from the north - west of the block towards the south - east, and separates the densley populated{residential area}to the south from the more{rural landscape}to the north. The residential areas vary from {terraced houses}built over one hundred years ago through{private}and{council post-war developments up to modern, {luxury housing}and each locality displays a keen sense of community. {Industry}has changed much with the decline of the{cotton}mill and a wide range of light,{modern industries}have developed, some in the old cotton mills,many on purpose built{industrial {estates.
